name: Tupper Ware Racing Party
description:
A fan-made game by Battle Stag Studio, inspired by the band TWRP (Tupper Ware Remix Party).  A small, karting-themed demo game and proof-of-concept celebrating the music and themes of TWRP.

Play as one of the four band members across three tracks, using four available items to aid in your victories!

Tupper Ware Racing Party is intended as a free-to-play game for fans of TWRP. If you would like to know more about TWRP and their music, please follow the following links:

https://twrp.bandcamp.com/music

https://twrp.store-08.com/featured/

______________________________________________

The Deets

This is a small game development project, still in progress! If you find any bugs or problems please detail them in a comment and I will look into addressing them.

Currently the game consists of a Grand Prix-style racing format where you face off against 3 other AI drivers modelled after TWRP band members. Each track (of which there are 3) is themed to either a TWRP song or message, and contains little references to their music.

It also contains fan art by these amazing people:

  • @atomicpitou
  • @courtney_lunn
  • Davide Orlando

The controls can be viewed under "Options" in either the Main Menu or any in-game Menu.

The game currently features 4 power-ups:

1) Keytar - toss an exploding keytar!

2) Speed Boost.

3) Foodbar - gain a brief buff of weight, size and speed.

4) Release the Kraken!

The Distant Future

In time, the following are intended to be added:

  • Time trial game mode!
  • More items!
  • More tracks!
  • Phantom Racer game mode!
  • Bonus characters!

But Also the 1980s

This work is done in free-time, so dates cannot be guaranteed. Sorry! So far this project has taken 7 months or so, and it's my first game development project. Thank you for understanding and supporting this work!

Yours Truly,

Battle Stag
